title: Bug 9654: Modify Parameters - Dialog details
description: Bug 9654: Modify Parameters - Dialog details duplicated name validation could be performed on the first page. The first and second column could be merged.
OB: a. The buttons are too small. b. When the dialog comes up, no table entry is selected, however, both move buttons are enabled. c. When changing a parameter name to something very long, the preview is cut off. d. The dialog comes up huge for methods with many parameters.
EB: a. Expect the buttons to be appropriately sized. b. Expect the dialog to have a selected table entry when it comes up. c. Expect the preview to properly display when changing a parameter name to something very long. d. Expect the dialog size to be appropriate for methods with many parameters.
SR: To reproduce: 1. Open the Modify Parameters dialog. 2. Observe the size of the buttons. 3. Observe the selected table entry when the dialog comes up. 4. Change a parameter name to something very long and observe the preview. 5. Test with a method with many parameters and observe the dialog size.
